document.full_text: japanese economics minister kaoru yosano said on sunday the government may need to spend 10 trillion yen to 15 trillion yen ($184 billion) for reconstruction from the devastating earthquake that hit the country's northeast in march.
document.title: japan quake reconstruction may cost up to $184 billion: yosano
lines_and_colors: japanese economics minister kaoru yosano said on sunday the government may need to spend 10 trillion yen to 15 trillion yen ($184 billion) for reconstruction from the devastating earthquake that hit the country's northeast in march.
